itemInfo.itemDesc:
Fresh salad with quality fish meat. 
- Unique effect: Movement Speed Rank +1 for 75 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Mudskipper
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Fried Fish, Steamed Fish, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Onion
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Oatmeal, Stir-Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Onion Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Dressing
item.desc:
A sauce with soft flavor and texture.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Seafood Mushroom Salad, Fish Filet Salad, etc.
